successes.title: HackRF, an open source SDR platform
successes.description: Transmit or receive any radio signal from 30 MHz to 6000 MHz on USB power with HackRF.

Pledges.description: PCB:  A HackRF printed circuit board you can use to build your own HackRF peripheral or keep as a souvenir.
EARLY-BIRD: A HackRF peripheral with enclosure and telescopic antenna. Thanks for spreading the word about HackRF!
HACKRF:  A HackRF peripheral with enclosure and telescopic antenna.
HACKRF-HF:  A HackRF peripheral with enclosure and telescopic antenna plus a Ham It Up RF upconverter for MF and HF bands.
FULL-DUPLEX:  Two HackRF peripherals with enclosures and telescopic antennas.
FULL-DUPLEX-HF: Two HackRF peripherals with enclosures and telescopic antennas plus two Ham It Up RF upconverters for MF and HF bands.

PROTOTYPE: A HackRF prototype peripheral with laser-cut acrylic enclosure, telescopic antenna, extra antennas, a Ham It Up RF upconverter, and a HackRF PortaPack will ship in October.  A final HackRF peripheral with enclosure, telescopic antenna and Ham It Up RF upconverter will ship in January.
